# Mobile American Notary & Apostilles

> Mobile American Notary & Apostilles is a Los Angeles-based mobile notary, apostille, Live Scan fingerprinting, certified translation, and jail wedding coordination service. We serve Los Angeles, Orange, Ventura, San Bernardino, Riverside, and Santa Barbara Counties. Phone: (213) 933-2507.

## Core Services

- [Home](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/)
- [Mobile Notary Services](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/notary.html)
- [Apostille & Document Legalization](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/apostille.html)
- [Live Scan Fingerprinting](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/livescan.html)
- [Certified Document Translations](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/translations.html)
- [Jail Wedding & Inmate Marriage Services](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/services/jail-weddings.html)
- [Apostille Intake Form](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/apostille-intake-form.html)
- [Pricing & Fees](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/pricing.html)
- [FAQ](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/faq.html)
- [About](https://www.mobileamericannotary.com/about.html)
